main event: A witness reported seeing a round white light that hovered at 5,000 feet for 3 minutes before disappearing in Ramona, California on 12 August 1965.
interesting points: The witness was a 67-year-old lady who said the light was similar to a very bright star, but she was sure it was not a star.
The witness said the sighting occurred at night and the light was still reasonably bright when it disappeared.
The witness said there was no sound associated with the object.
The witness said the object displayed no lights, vapor trail, or other distinguishing features.
The object accelerated from a slow speed to a very high speed and disappeared into a cloud.
